```{r}
library(GGally)
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

```{r}
# look at df
view(penguins)

# view column names
names(penguins)
```

```{r}
# can also check dimensions
dim(penguins)
```

```{r}
# summary!
summary(penguins)
```

```{r}
# summary with skimr
skimr::skim(penguins)
```

```{r}
# head that
head(penguins)
```

```{r}
# tail that
tail(penguins)
```

### Getting plotty

```{r}
# pair plot with GGally
GGally::ggpairs(penguins)
```

```{r}
# make a nicer pair plot (select # of columns)
GGally::ggpairs(penguins, columns = 3:6, ggplot2::aes(colour = species))
```

```{r}
# histogram of penguin flipper lengths
ggplot(data = penguins, aes(x = flipper_length_mm)) +
  geom_histogram()
```
